lead_paragraph: ALDERMAN--Nancy. Nancy Alderman, 65, died January 25, 2016. For 17 years she lived in New York as corporate executive in the retail fashion industry, becoming Senior Vice President for Belk Stores Services. She is survived by two sisters. Memorial service, at a future date, will be held in Greensboro, NC. www.haneslineberryfune ralhomes.com. 1/3
